text: Mumenye yuko intumwa y’Imana iri kumwe namwe, iyo iba gamburukira mubintu vyinshi, ntankeka mwari kugira ingorane mugabo Imana yaraba shajije kubu Isilamu bwanyu nuku bushariza mu mitima yanyu, nayo niyo yabagiriye urwanko rw’uguhakana ubuhakanyi bw’Imana n’ukwidohora mu nzira y’ukuri, abo nibo bantu barongotse
